ac: 18, touch 12, flat-footed 15 (+5 armor, +3 Dex, –2 rage, +1 shield, +1 size)
special_attacks: rage (11 rounds/day), rage powers (superstition +3, surprise accuracy +2)
other_gear: +1 chain shirt, masterwork buckler, lance, masterwork halfling sling staff with 20 bullets, riding dog with riding saddle and leather barding, 55 gp
feats: Deadly Aim, Weapon Focus (halfling sling staff)

sections.body:
Before Combat The barbarian applies oil of magic weapon.

During Combat The barbarian keeps his distance, pelting enemies with bullets. If ranged attacks fail, he charges with his lance.

Base Statistics When not raging and without magic weapon, the barbarian's statistics are

AC 20, touch 14, flat-footed 17

hp 35

Fort +6

Will +3; Meleelance +7 (1d6+2/×3); Ranged mwk halflingsling staff +10 (1d6+2/×3); Str 14, Con 13; CMB +5; Skills Climb +9, Swim +5.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: Small and adept at skirmish maneuvers, a dog rider is a deadly and cautious warrior.

name: Dog Rider
skills: Acrobatics +11, Handle Animal +6, Perception +10, Ride +9, Stealth +10, Survival +5
will: +5; +3 vs. spells and spell-like or supernatural abilities, +2 vs. fear
combat_gear: oils of magic weapon (2), potions of cure light wounds (2)
